extDescription.message: Switch User-Agent in a single click between normal and custom User-Agent.

howToSwitchUserAgentExplanation.message: Once you save a custom User-Agent, just click the extension icon to enable/disable it.

configureUserAgent.message: User-Agent, when plugin icon is active

leaveUsYourOpinion.message: If you like the extension, please leave your opinion

createShortcutForThePlugin.message: Tip: You can configure a keyboard shortcut to switch User-Agent even faster. Type this in a new tab: chrome://extensions/configureCommands

aboutText.message: Developed by Xabier Legasa. This extension is opensource
